text: Boris Stefanov (born 6 May 1946) is a Bulgarian equestrian. He competed in two events at the 1972 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:Bulgarian male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Bulgaria Category:Equestrians at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:People from Targovishte
title: Boris Stefanov (equestrian)
